price: Waɗanda Muka bã su littãfi daga gabãninsa (Alƙur'ãni), su mãsu ĩmãni ne da shi.*
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ مِن قَبۡلِهِۦ هُم بِهِۦ يُؤۡمِنُونَ
footnotes: * Mun sãdar da ilmin Taurãta da ilmin Alƙur'ãni, kowãne ya gaskata wani, ko kuwa Mun sãdar da maganar Alƙur'ani, wata ta bi wata, babu bambanci ga fasãha da abũbuwan ban mãmaki a cikinsu.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna ātaynāhumu al-kitāba min qablihi hum bihi yu'minūna
